content: not redistribute with or without charge in any form this includes scanning emailing photocopying retyping posting to the internet and any other form of redistribution permission is granted to sell items made using this design but please include my name listed as the designer on a tag or label do not claim this design as your own permission is granted for you to post photos of items made from this pattern to your website blog social media or ravelry com but please include a link to the original pattern page on ravelry com where possible page 2
